title: Ford eyeing a comeback? US car giant may re-enter India with a green twist
description: Ford Comback in India: Ford is exploring a re-entry into the Indian market, focusing on electrics and sustainability. After exiting India in 2021, Ford is evaluating a feasibility report on new investments and production for local sales and exports. The company, which had invested over $2 billion in India, sees the market as vital for future growth amidst stagnation in Western markets.
